title: A model of timing in simple anticipatory decisions
authors: Alexander Wurm, Konstantina Sokratous, Guy Hawkins, Peter Kvam
abstract: This paper presents an accumulator model for timing choices in anticipatory response tasks, examining how people make perceptual decisions involving stimulus trajectory prediction. The research finds that participants are more likely to respond too late than too early when making anticipatory decisions.
venue: Proceedings of the Annual Meeting of the Cognitive Science Society, Vol. 43
